roleset.name: make a boat go
roleset.note: ROW-V NOTES: Frames file for 'row' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entries 51.4.2 and 11.5, Framenet entries Transportation and Conversation. The latter is incorrect; it applies only to the nominal 'row' (pron "RAU"). (from row.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: intransitive
example.text: *trace*-1 A San Francisco lawyer, Mr. Panelli-1 rowed religiously when he first got the machine, but, he complains, it left grease marks on his carpet, ``and it was boring.
example.arg: when he first got the machine

example.name: with boat
example.text: John rowed his boat in the bathtub.

example.name: Arg0
example.text: They say boldness favours the brave and this proved true for Oliver of his rowing the Atlantic Ocean.
